projectGridLines.title: Title: Internship with Infrastructure CFO
projectGridLines.description:
Title: Internship with Infrastructure CFO

Description: Infrastructure CFO teams works with various Infrastructure Functions to do Financial Planning & Analysis, Planning, Forecasting, MI Reporting, Deep Dives on Costs, Variance Analysis. The person is expected to get involved in any one or more areas above and work with Finance Directors/CFOs to help them do these analysis

Skill sets: Good knowledge of Excel, Financial Business products

Traits expectation:

Expected learning: Financial Planning & Analysis

Specific courses required for project execution: Any MBA with core Finance Background.
